page.title: 16MOD NA HEARADH
page.content: Every year in Harris we have a local mod.It is a Gaelic festival.It is held in the community hall in Tarbert and the primary have their competitions in the primary school.On Wednesday night the musical competitions take place.On Friday the childrens competitions are staged and on Friday night the prize winners concert is held in the Community Hall.There are musical and oral competitions.The winners in the music section get small trophies and in the oral they get certificates. There are also cups for the school with the highest mark in Gaelic.There are 8 major trophies to be won,3 of them for choral competitions.Several of the winners at local mod level,go on to compete at the National Mod held every October.The venue varies each year.The 1985 Mod will be held in Fort William.
